# #Create DataFrame for the ststorehold LMS Table
# ststorehold = spark.read.load('abfss://synapse@' + StorageAccountRead2 + '.dfs.core.windows.net/Structured Data/OPS/ststorehold.parquet', format='parquet')
# ststorehold.createOrReplaceTempView("ststorehold")

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW
ststoresonhold
AS
SELECT
logid as lms_storesonhold_logid
,billcustid as lms_storesonhold_billcustid
,storeid as lms_storesonhold_storeid
,dateactioned as lms_storesonhold_dateactioned
,userid as lms_storesonhold_userid
,onholdfrom as lms_storesonhold_onholdfrom
,onholdto as lms_storesonhold_onholdto
,delaytypeid as lms_storesonhold_delaytypeid
,hs.lms_holdstatus_description
,reasonid as lms_storesonhold_reasonid
,sh.lms_storehold_description
,sh.lms_storehold_keepfreight
,comment as lms_storesonhold_comment
,requester as lms_storesonhold_requester
,daterequested as lms_storesonhold_daterequested

FROM
dbostoresonhold soh

LEFT JOIN ststorehold sh on soh.reasonid = sh.lms_storehold_id
LEFT JOIN stholdstatus hs on soh.delaytypeid = hs.lms_holdstatus_id
